Packages
com.sony.smarteyeglass The SmartEyeglassControl API is a utility class which contains declared constants for the SmartEyeglass API Refer to SmartEyeglassControl for a detailed description of the Control API.
com.sony.smarteyeglass.extension.util The SmartEyeglassControl class declares constants for the SmartEyeglass Control API.
com.sony.smarteyeglass.extension.util.ar Contains the classes for that encapsulate rendering data for the AR rendering engine.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.control The Control API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, enables an app extension to take total control of the accessory.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.notification The Notification API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, enables gathering of event-type data from different sources into one place.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.registration The Registration API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, defines and implements an Android ContentProvider that the app extensions can access via the Android ContentResolver API.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.sensor The Sensor API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, is used to send accessory sensor data from a host application to an accessory app extension.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.tunnel The Tunnel API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, enables the app extensions to communicate with the host application using foreground priority to improve user experience during time sensitive interactions.
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.aef.widget The Widget API, part of the Smart Extension APIs for Sony's smart accessories, enables the app extension to display a live image on the main menu of the accessory (like a preview of the app extension itself).
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util  
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.control  
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.notification  
com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.registration

com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.widget
